snippet: Bill Clinton's prosecutorial speech to the Democratic Convention on Wednesday night went as far as anyone has this year to delineate the differences between the Democratic and Republican agendas, President Obama said on Thursday.
abstract: Bill Clinton's prosecutorial speech to the Democratic Convention on Wednesday night went as far as anyone has this year to delineate the differences between the Democratic and Republican agendas, President Obama said on Thursday.

headline.main: Obama Praises Clinton and Talks Stadium Move in Call With Supporters
